column4: give me some reasons to emigrate from WINXP to Ubuntu? (i have to run 2 screens, TV+laptop or LCD screen), webcam on MSN, and i also need to be able to use my iPOD
you dont need a reason, if you want to use it, use it ... linux is not windows and will never be... if you want to have a free windows, linux is not for you
so you recommend that i'll use Windows?
if you want an OS thats like windows, than why not use it?
